concept.description: Calculates the duration of each method based on execution events.
concept.cypher: MATCH (e:Execution)-[:EXECUTES]->(m:Method) WITH m, SUM(e.afterTimestamp - e.beforeTimestamp) AS duration SET m.duration = duration RETURN m, duration

concept.description: Creates the weighted call graph, i.e., the CALLS relationships between methods based on call events.
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Call)-[:CALLED_BY]->(caller:Method) MATCH (c:Call)-[:CALLS]->(callee:Method) MERGE (caller)-[calls:CALLS]->(callee) WITH caller, callee, calls, COUNT(calls) as numberOfCalls SET calls.weight = numberOfCalls RETURN caller, callee, calls

concept.description: Creates the weighted dependency graph on type level, i.e., the DEPENDS_ON relationship between types if there are method calls between them.
concept.cypher: MATCH (dependent:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(:Method)-[calls:CALLS]->(:Method)<-[:DECLARES]-(dependency:Type) WHERE dependent<>dependency WITH dependent, dependency, SUM(calls.weight) as aggregatedMethodCalls MERGE (dependent)-[depends:DEPENDS_ON]->(dependency) SET depends.weight = aggregatedMethodCalls RETURN dependent, dependency, depends

concept.description: Creates a package derived from the fully qualified name of a type monitored by Kieker and a CONTAINS relationship to this type.
concept.cypher: MATCH (type:Type:Kieker) WITH type, SPLIT(type.fqn,'.') AS fqnList WITH type, REVERSE(tail(REVERSE(fqnList))) AS packageNames WITH type, HEAD(REVERSE(packageNames)) as packageName, SUBSTRING(REDUCE(tmp="", p IN packageNames | tmp + "." + p),1) as packageFqn MERGE (package:Package:Kieker {name:packageName, fqn:packageFqn}) MERGE (package)-[:CONTAINS]->(type) RETURN package, type

concept.description: Creates the weighted dependency graph on package level, i.e., the DEPENDS_ON relationship between packages if there are DEPENDS_ON relationships between their containing types.
concept.cypher: MATCH (dependent:Package:Kieker)-[:CONTAINS]->(:Type:Kieker)-[depends:DEPENDS_ON]->(:Type:Kieker)<-[:CONTAINS]-(dependency:Package:Kieker) WHERE dependent<>dependency WITH dependent, dependency, SUM(depends.weight) as aggregatedDependencies MERGE (dependent)-[depends:DEPENDS_ON]->(dependency) SET depends.weight = aggregatedDependencies RETURN dependent, dependency, depends
